Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename ImagePixelType, typename MaskPixelType>
lsst::detection::DetectionSet< ImagePixelType, MaskPixelType >::DetectionSet ( const lsst::fw::MaskedImage< ImagePixelType, MaskPixelType > &  maskedImg,
const float  threshold,
const std::string &  planeName = "",
const int  npixMin = 1 
)

Find a Detection Set given a MaskedImage and a threshold

Go through an image, finding sets of connected pixels above threshold and assembling them into Footprints; the resulting set of objects is returned as an array<FootprintPtrT>

Parameters:
maskedImg  MaskedImage to search for objects
threshold  threshold to find objects
planeName  mask plane to set (if != "")
npixMin  minimum number of pixels in an object

template<typename ImagePixelType, typename MaskPixelType>
lsst::detection::DetectionSet< ImagePixelType, MaskPixelType >::DetectionSet ( const lsst::fw::MaskedImage< ImagePixelType, MaskPixelType > &  img,
const float  threshold,
int  x,
int  y,
const vector< Peak > *  peaks = NULL 
)

Return a DetectionSet consisting a Footprint containing the point (x, y) (if above threshold)

Parameters:
img  Image to search for objects
threshold  threshold to find objects
x  Footprint should include this pixel (column)
y  Footprint should include this pixel (row)
peaks  Footprint should include at most one of these peaks

template<typename ImagePixelType, typename MaskPixelType>
lsst::detection::DetectionSet< ImagePixelType, MaskPixelType >::DetectionSet ( const DetectionSet< ImagePixelT, MaskPixelT > &  set,
int  r = 0 
)

Grow all the Footprints in the input DetectionSet, returning a new DetectionSet

The output DetectionSet may contain fewer Footprints, as some may well have been merged

Parameters:
r  Grow Footprints by r pixels
